events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago but received a different item, and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the wrong item received instead of the ordered jacket.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further with this matter.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I am here to help process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and upload a photo of the item you received to help us verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong jacket I received instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds good, I appreciate your prompt help and look forward to the refund being processed.
The refund request has been processed, and an email with return instructions and tracking for the prepaid label was sent to you.
Just checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the item and that the refund was received without any issues.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday and saw the refund reflected in my account today. Thanks for the smooth process!
We are glad you are satisfied with the resolution. We are closing this case now, and thank you for contacting our support team.
Please take a moment to complete a quick survey about your support experience to help us improve our services.
